spec_data.Name: php-horde-Horde-Text-Flowed
spec_data.Description:
The Horde_Text_Flowed:: class provides common methods for manipulating text
using the encoding described in RFC 3676 ('flowed' text).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:07:05 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Horde API for flowed text as per RFC 3676
